title: Incorrect result for json compare and `json_contains`
body:
## Bug Report

### Steps to reproduce

Ref https://github.com/pingcap/tidb/issues/50826

Run `json_contains('[9223372036854775807, 9817290126226250029]', '9223372036854775808')` on TiKV, TiKV gives `true`, but TiDB gives `false`.
